thread.title: UAE weather sees slight rise, chance of rain
thread.title_full: UAE weather sees slight rise, chance of rain

title: UAE weather sees slight rise, chance of rain
text:
UAE weather sees slight rise, chance of rain Web Team /Dubai Filed on February 23, 2017 | Last updated on February 23, 2017 at 08.33 am Share 
(AP) It's also going be more humid. The UAE is set to experience cloudy weather today according to the latest update by the National Centre of Meteorology and Seismology (NCMS). According to the forecast, temperatures will see a slight rise today. The rise will be accompanied by an increase in humidity levels throughout the day - especially during the night. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 23, 2017 Winds may cause dust to rise from the ground and residents are advised to be mindful of limited visibility. According to weather.com, the lowest temperature for today is forecast at 17 °C with highs of 24 °C Share
